en.title: **DevOps Engineer** Co-op
en.text: Working with DevOps and development teams to optimize CI/CD infrastructure and Kubernetes deployments across the organization. Led initiatives to improve pipeline efficiency through intelligent caching strategies, reducing infrastructure costs and deployment times. Architected automation solutions using TypeScript, Docker, and Kubernetes while providing enterprise-wide support to ensure reliable and scalable software delivery.

en.title: **Full-Stack** Developer
en.text:
Working with a team of developers and testers to design and implement backend solutions for our client's services, with a focus on:

  • Security
  • Scalability to handle millions of users globally
  • Developing RESTful APIs
  • Optimizing database performance with PostgreSQL
  • Building services with Node.js, Python, and PowerShell

Together, we ensure our client's backend infrastructure stays robust and efficient.

en.title: **Web Development** Intern
en.text: Contributed to the development of robust frontend and backend systems for Credit Management System, integrating third-party services and improving data processing efficiency through cloud functions.
